message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $800,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product. This would be a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $750,000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
